summary: NPC files for use in the creation kit.
descriptionHtml: Seeing as so many people have asked for followers based on my  Ningheim Girl Presets, I have released all the NPC files should you wish to use them as the basis of your own follower mods.  Note that followers based on Elise, Braith and Skyla are included in the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39532]PixeledVixens Ningheim Followers[/url] mod I made with geegee.
author: PixeledVixens
